name: Cave Runner 3D
description:
A game made with a random game idea generator.

The constraints were: Runner, One Room, Prehistoric, Lost Love.

You play as a prehistoric human, that comes back to his cave and finds his wife dead, maybe killed by some wild animal. You have 2 minutes to complete the resurrection ritual or she will be lost forever!

It' s a prototype, but could be easily be turned into a full game.

CONTROLS

lx arrow = move left

rx arrow = move right

CREDITS

MUSIC

Tafi Maradi no voice by Kevin MacLeod
